history.proof: intro H. strivial use: fact_gt_0, Nat.neq_0_lt_0.

original: intro H. unfold not. intros contra. pose (dh := divides_n_fact_n n). destruct (euclid (fact n) (fact (S n)) dh) as (q, (r, (eq1, ltr))). subst; rewrite fact_S in eq1. assert (ltd: r < fact n). { rewrite <- lt_n_Sm_le. rewrite <- eq1. apply divides_fact_S. } apply (not_lt_n_le r (fact n)). - apply le_trans with (m := fact (S n)). + apply le_S_q. subst; apply ltr. + apply le_trans with (m := fact n). * apply ltd. * apply le_S. apply divides_fact_S. - apply lt_trans with n. + apply fact_gt_0. + apply divides_n_fact_n.
